name: Pakhan
thoughts: Low damage roll but with Destructive you have a good weapon for PvE. Re-roll Vicious for Ferocious.

name: Tactical SASG-12 K
thoughts: Average damage roll. While no the best talent combo, Responsive is great. You can re-roll Self-preserved if you really need one SASG.

name: Covert SRS
thoughts: Almost maximum damage roll. While the SRS variants a bit lower dmg than the M700 or M44, the talents are great and their handling is good. I'd re-roll Talented for Destructive.

name: Liberator
thoughts: Great damage roll. The handling of the Liberator is the same as the Police M4 but the talents are good for an utility weapon. I'd re-roll Swift for Destructive or Determined.

name: Double Barrel Sawed Off Shotgun
thoughts: Good talents for a skill power buid. Re-roll according to your needs. Talented for Predatory makes sense.

name: M700 Carbon
thoughts: Average damage roll. Elevated and Destructive are great. I'd re-roll Unforgiving for Prepared, Ferocious or Coolheaded depending on your build.

name: Extended Magazine
thoughts: Almost maximum size and it has CHC. Good buy if you need one magazine.

name: Omega Rifle Suppressor
thoughts: Great attribute combo, just the HSD could be better. Must buy.

name: Russian Red Dot Sight
thoughts: Good scope if you want accuracy on your shotguns.

name: PEQ-15 Laser - Green
thoughts: If you need accuracy on your MMRs, the grip is the best slot to get it to not give up HSD on scope and muzzle. Good for the fast firing ones or even the MDR.

name: Vigorous Chest
thoughts: Decent armor. Good buy if you want a Vigorous chest. I'd keep HoK and EAD, just re-roll the main stat or max it out.

name: Sentry Holster
thoughts: If you need a Sentry holster for a NinjaBike build or to complete the 4pc set, this holster is a good buy. Max out the Firearms or Electronics.

name: Nimble Holster
thoughts: Good rolls overall. I'd max out the Stamina roll.

name: Final Measure Chest
thoughts: Low armor roll but it could be useful if you need one piece to complete your set for a PvP build. I'd re-roll Kill XP for Ammo Capacity.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: Max support station healing speed, great for reclaimer builds.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: Almost max FA and skill haste, good for a number of builds.
